FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Database Attributes Request Message that was processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep Alive, 3: Successful Completion, 4: Failed Completion, 5: Invalid Request)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Used to indicate product URI as requestor or responder. Also can be used to provide function call status or error code in case of failed completion. (1: Product file placed in URI specified by requestor, 2: Product file placed in URI specified by the responder, Other: Error code of the failed completion

FIELD.NAME: ATTRIBUTE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the type of Database Attributes for the first mnemonic to be returned. Value is 6: List of All Mnemonics

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-29. Product Categories... Value is TAC: Telemetry and Command)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message. Value is in the range 1+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URI specifying the location where the (single) output file product is stored

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the name of the output file

FIELD.NAME: DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version of the file
